timeline.message: Update insitutionRole only if its updated
Extracting styles and handling other text

timeline.bodyText: Are you using this instead of java.lang.String.isEmpty to avoid NPEs?
timeline.author: als364

timeline.bodyText: Since this does conflict handling, could you please indicate that in the name of the function?
timeline.author: als364
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -417,6 +418,41 @@ public DbUser createUser(
     return dbUser;
   }

replies.bodyText: Or, better, could you also call saveUserWithConflictHandling in this function?
replies.author: als364

replies.bodyText: Will change it to updateUserWithConflictHandling since i do want the name to specify that we are updating user and its related table (like verified institution in this case)
replies.author: NehaBroad

timeline.message: Use string | React.ReactNode rather than any
